title: National Adoption Month, 2025
summary: This proclamation declares November 2025 as National Adoption Month, emphasizing the importance of safe and nurturing homes for children. It highlights the President's commitment to supporting adoption through initiatives like the One Big Beautiful Bill Act, which made the adoption tax credit more accessible, and the Family First Prevention Services Act, aimed at keeping families intact. The proclamation also mentions a recent Executive Order on Fostering the Future for American Children and Families, designed to provide resources for young people in or transitioning out of the foster care system. The document honors parents and families involved in adoption and reaffirms a commitment to protecting children and strengthening families.
